definition: Yunxiao county in Zhangzhou 漳州[Zhang1 zhou1], Fujian
surname Yun/abbr. for Yunnan Province 雲南省|云南省[Yun2 nan2 Sheng3]
Yunxiao county in Zhangzhou 漳州[Zhang1 zhou1], Fujian

sentences.english: Roofless towers appeared and disappeared, thrusting blindly upward.
sentences.chinese: 無頂的塔不斷顯現又隱匿，盲目的直插雲霄。

sentences.english: Suddenly a great cracking sound split the air .
sentences.chinese: 突然，一聲巨大的爆裂聲響徹雲霄。

sentences.english: But scalpers said that weekend prices are higher and holiday-time prices will go through the roof.
sentences.chinese: 可是黃牛說週末價錢更高，假期票價將會高入雲霄。

sentences.english: As the rolle coaster started to move, Tommy squeezed his eyes shut.
sentences.chinese: 雲霄飛車啓動時，湯米把眼睛緊緊閉上。

sentences.english: Why didn't they just use footage for "Top Gun" again?
sentences.chinese: 爲什麼他們只用雙腳就想“直上雲霄”？

sentences.english: But your aerials should not stand too high , say, pierce into the sky.
sentences.chinese: 但你心靈中的天線不應挺得太高，比如說，插入雲霄。

sentences.english: THINK of theme parks and you think of roller coasters .
sentences.chinese: 一提到主題樂園，你馬上想到的雲霄飛車。

sentences.english: The lofty peaks tower into the clouds.
The big young master is O. K. some, can be even now of six cloudy regionses but is must not be offended of main son.
sentences.chinese: 大少爺還好些，可眼前的陸雲霄卻是個不好惹的主兒。

sentences.english: Canst thou lift up thy voice to the clouds, that an abundance of waters may cover thee?
sentences.chinese: 你豈能使你的聲音上達雲霄，使雨水沛然降在你處？

sentences.english: The National Anthem of make the welkin ring.
Do you sometimes think you're riding an emotional* roller coaster?
sentences.chinese: 你有時是否感覺像坐在情緒的雲霄飛車上？

sentences.english: Its highest peak rises abruptly from a plain to 3099m. above sea level.
sentences.chinese: 峨嵋最高峯海拔3099米，從平地直衝雲霄。

sentences.english: The enthusiastic flame rushes to the highest heavens.
He also makes sure to take his children and grandchildren for a ride.
sentences.chinese: 他也保證會讓他的孩子和孫輩們去乘坐雲霄飛車。
萬英尺高的山峯直插雲霄。

definition: lit. ten thousand fathoms/fig. extremely high or deep/lofty/bottomless
(literary) the vast sky/(finance) eventual downturn/poor prospects in the long term
Wanli township in New Taipei City 新北市[Xin1 bei3 shi4], Taiwan
to gaze afar/to look into the distance
sudden clap of thunder/fig. surprising turn of events
to spiral/to circle/to go around/to hover/to orbit
